summary.Title: Warehouse Supervisor
summary.Presentation: Requisition ID:  26664,  Location(s): Videbæk, Region Midtjylland, DK,  Work experience: Professional

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Requisition ID:  26664,

Location(s): Videbæk, Region Midtjylland, DK,

Work experience: Professional

Type of position:  Full-Time

Are you experienced Supervisor looking for new opportunities in the renewable energy sector? Our Global Tools team is awaiting for the professional who would join the team to bring the results to the new level and #powerthesolutions together!

Sales - Global Construction Management - Tools Region EMEA

In Global Tools we are responsible for the usage, delivery and support on tools for our turbines around the world. You will be part of a sub-department that gives technical support to the sites and projects located in the EMEA region (Europe, the Middle East and Africa) as well as Russia, Ukraine and Kazakhstan. You will be part of a large international team consisting of many different profiles ranging from procurement, warehouse, production, in- and outbound, Pick and Pack, to logistics as well as technical engineering. We are placed in four locations: In Videbæk (Denmark), in Husum, Mutzschen (Germany), Zaragoza (Spain), and Warrington (England).

Responsibilities

As a Supervisor Pick/Pack & In- and Outbound in our department, you will be responsible for the coordination of the daily operations in the department, supervising the team of Material Handlers in Warehouse Tools Region, EMEA in Videbæk (a total of approx. 32 employees). Daily tasks for Supervisor include:

  • Planning of daily activities
  • Adapt the workforce to the work tasks
  • Create KPI's to improve daily work and processes
  • Conduct one-to-ones with the employees in the team
  • Make sure that the employees have the right training
  • Budgeting
  • Optimise the workflow and processes within logistic handling
  • Create/sustain a good working environment

Qualifications

We are looking for experienced Supervisor, who will have:

  • Min. 3 years of Warehousing, Logistics, Supply Chain or Third-Party experience
  • Min. 3 years of supervisor/leadership experience. Prior warehouse/logistics experience preferred
  • Experience in SAP is required to have (SAP (PE01), SAP Document Management System (DMS))
  • Experience in handling employee relation issues with direct staff in compliance with company procedures and processes
  • Proficiency in English and Danish - both verbally and in writing
  • Experience in distribution including receiving, pick/pack/ship, inventory, operations, and facilities  
  • Experience with (or as) Health, Safety & Environment (Officer) 
  • Experience with LEAN fundamentals
  • Experience with projects and turn arounds
  • Experience with KPIs, performance management

Competences

On a personal level, you identify yourself to possess the following characteristics:

  • The capability of coaching others in the daily work and in projects
  • You do follow up on tasks and agreements
  • A proven ability to work with limited supervision and in teams in a time-sensitive setting
  • An open minded and being good at sharing/gathering information within a team
  • Able to cope with change and working under ambiguous circumstances, keeping a clear head and overview in stressful daily work
  • Significant interpersonal and communication skills, focusing on good teamwork

What we offer

We offer an exciting job with great opportunities for professional and personal development in an inspiring environment with the energy industry's global partner on sustainable energy solutions. We value initiative, responsibility and the right balance between creativity and quality in all solutions. You will become part of a highly professional environment with a significant technical commitment.

Additional information

Work location: Videbæk (Denmark).

Please apply till 18th of May 2022. 

Click the button "Send ansøgning" to send your application.

About Vestas

Vestas is the energy industry’s global partner on sustainable energy solutions. We are specialised in designing, manufacturing, installing, and servicing wind turbines, both onshore and offshore. 

Across the globe, we have installed more wind power than anyone else. We consider ourselves pioneers within the industry, as we continuously aim to design new solutions and technologies to create a more sustainable future for all of us. With more than 145 GW of wind power installed worldwide and 40+ years of experience in wind energy, we have an unmatched track record demonstrating our expertise within the field. 

With 29,000 employees globally, we are a diverse team united by a common goal: to power the solution – today, tomorrow, and far into the future. 

Vestas promotes a diverse workforce which embraces all social identities and is free of any discrimination. We commit to create and sustain an environment that acknowledges and harvests different experiences, skills, and perspectives. We also aim to give everyone equal access to opportunity. 

To learn more about our company and life at Vestas, we invite you to visit our website at www.vestas.com and follow us on our social media channels. We also encourage you to join our Talent Universe to receive notifications on new and relevant postings.


Denne jobannonce blev oprindeligt opslået på https://www.ofir.dk/
(Den originale annonce kan ses på: https://www.ofir.dk/showojob?ofirid=3bfb0518)
